column2: by finding opposite positions like BTC_USD to BTC_USD

column1: Actually I'm checking sum(leverage\*amount) for both up-positions and down-positions. If amount could be fit to balance this is okay to add the bet. (I'm checking this only for simple positions)
if it is not fit to the balance of opposites I check if the bet's leverage*amount  <  10% from free totalfund (that is  collected from fees and rekt positions).
So we need some initial fund to start accept bets";"";"";

column3: TotalFund  is all available amount on global pricespk address.  TotalRekt - what was rekt
column4: TotalBets - amount on all bets not rekt or cashed out.

column1: So fees are somewhere  within (TotalFunds - TotalRekt - TotalBets)";"";"";
